A S√©rie de jogos Counter Strike foi por muitos um dos melhores meios de se passar o tempo des da era antiga quando iamos nas famosa lan house para encontrar os amigos e se divertir um pouco, com o tempo foi fortemente divulgado entre as plataformas Twitch e Youtube, com isso muitos jogadores casuais se dedicaram para virarem pro-players.

Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is easily the best first person shooter out for PC. I've actively played it now for over five years and still enjoy it to this day. No other game has been able to keep my attention and enjoyment for such a long period of time. The professional scene in the game is just fantastic. It's a lot of fun to watch. 

There just isn't another shooter out there that has the perfect mix of strategy, mechanical skill, and balance quite like CS:GO does.
Takes decent investment to become an ok player, definitely worth the investment.
